summary: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.
cast: Demi Moore|Emilio Estevez|Tom Skerritt|Veronica Cartwright|William Allen Young|Richard Minchenberg|Ernie Brown|Bill Henderson|Gene Ross|Liam Sullivan|Charlie Sheen|Hal Fishman|Chuck Henry|Nicholas Shields|Barbara Stamm|Santos Morales|Gus Corrado|Golden Henning|Rene Sprattling|Kate McKinnon|Tim Sapunor|Charlie Holliday|Ron Presson|Estee Chandler|Jeff Boudov|Thomas Whit Ellis|David DeFrancesca|Leon Corcos|Janet Rotblatt|Erika Lincoln|Sid Conrad|Henry Proach|Matt Robinson|Bob Devon Jones|Jim Lane|Ed Smith|John Deaderick|Beau Dare|Gilbert O. Parra|Jamie Namson
keywords: street shootout|written and directed by cast member|brat pack|on the run|bank robber
title: Wisdom, el delincuente
